title: Public Transport
description: As a tourist visiting Kyiv, using mainly public transport is a great way to explore the large city while also saving money. The public transportation system in Kyiv is well-developed, reliable, and inexpensive, with a variety of options including metro, buses, trams, and trolleybuses. By using public transport, tourists can also experience the daily life of locals, see more of the city, and avoid the stress and expense of navigating unfamiliar streets and parking. Additionally, public transport is a more eco-friendly option, reducing carbon emissions and helping to preserve the city's natural environment.
